title: Product Name
markdownDescription:
https://developers.vtex.com/vtex-developer-docs/docs/vtex-store-components-productname

The `ProductName` is a block responsible for **displaying the product name** along other information such as **SKU** or **brand**.

`"vtex.store-components@3.x"`

title.markdownDescription: Define a custom name. It will be shown in site editor for faster identification.

props.markdownDescription: All available properties for this block.

tag.markdownDescription: HTML tag used. It can be: `div`, `h1`, `h2`, `h3`.

blockClass.markdownDescription:
`string | string[]`

displayMode.markdownDescription:
`boolean`

Possible values: `linkToProductPage` (show the product link associated with its name) or `plainText` (to show only the product name).

oneOf.markdownDescription: Show the product link associated with its name
